llm_text:
Why:
- payment_format_ach = 1 (SHAP +3.04756, increases) — the model’s largest driver is that this is an ACH payment.
- dayofweek = 6 (Sunday) (SHAP +0.661366, increases) — timing on dayofweek 6 contributed upward.
- payment_currency_saudi_riyal = 1 (SHAP +0.481182, increases) and receiving_currency_saudi_riyal = 1 (SHAP +0.214484, increases) — both currency features increased the score.
- amount_received = 31774.2 (SHAP +0.423898, increases) — the received amount contributed to the flag.
- from_bank = 48308 (SHAP −0.512748, decreases) — this sending bank ID reduced the score but did not offset the increases.

Conclusion:
The transaction was flagged primarily because it is an ACH transfer (payment_format_ach=1) in Saudi Riyal (payment_currency_saudi_riyal=1; receiving_currency_saudi_riyal=1) of 31,774.2 on dayofweek=6, with the sending bank (from_bank=48308) only partially mitigating the signal. If further review is needed, focus on the ACH payment, currency, timing, and amount.
